properties.entry: SELECT EE.*,ABC.*, CASE WHEN SYSDATE -ABC.CREATE_DT > 1 THEN TO_CHAR(ABC.CREATE_DT , 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_CHAR(ABC.CREATE_DT , 'HH24:MI:SS') END AS "CREATE", ZXC.BOARD_NAME FROM (SELECT MIN(FF.BOARD_NO) MAXVIEW FROM(SELECT BB.* FROM BOARD BB JOIN (SELECT EZ.BOARD_CD, MAX(READ_COUNT) MAXRC FROM BOARD EZ WHERE CREATE_DT> SYSDATE-7 AND STATUS_CD =1 GROUP BY BOARD_CD) CC ON (BB.BOARD_CD =CC.BOARD_CD)WHERE READ_COUNT >= CC.MAXRC) FF GROUP BY FF.BOARD_CD) EE JOIN BOARD ABC ON (ABC.BOARD_NO = EE.MAXVIEW) JOIN BOARD_CODE ZXC ON (ABC.BOARD_CD = ZXC.BOARD_CD) WHERE ZXC.BOARD_CD IN (10, 20, 30 , 70, 80, 90) ORDER BY ZXC.BOARD_CD

SELECT ROWNUM , B.* , CASE WHEN SYSDATE -B.CREATE_DT > 1 THEN TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DT , 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DT , 'HH24:MI:SS') END AS "NEWCREATE" FROM(SELECT * FROM BOARD JOIN BOARD_CODE USING(BOARD_CD) WHERE BOARD_CD = ?ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) B WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND ? AND STATUS_CD = 1

SELECT ROWNUM , ABC.* FROM(SELECT DD.* , C.ANIMAL_PROFILE_IMG ANIMALIMG, D.* ,D2.ANIMAL_CATEGORY_NM FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO , COUNT(*) AS "LIKECOUNT" FROM(SELECT * FROM BOARD JOIN "LIKE" USING(BOARD_NO)WHERE BOARD_CD = 70)GROUP BY BOARD_NO) DD JOIN BOARD B ON (B.BOARD_NO = DD.BOARD_NO) JOIN MEMBER C ON (B.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN ANIMAL D ON (C.MEMBER_NO = D.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN ANIMAL_CATEGORY D2 ON (D.ANIMAL_CATEGORY_CD = D2.ANIMAL_CATEGORY_CD) AND B.CREATE_DT > SYSDATE-30 AND ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY LIKECOUNT DESC) ABC
